rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that respects Vastu guidelines by aligning the main door in the south-east direction.
An open-plan space combining living and dining areas with Mediterranean aesthetics. Natural light is maximized through large windows facing east to promote energy flow.
An open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area with functional layout and Vastu-compliant placement of cooking appliances in the southeast corner.
A dedicated library space designed with bookshelves and comfortable seating, positioned towards the west to harness positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Space for storage of cleaning supplies and other utilities; placed in a less significant location to minimize interference with the main flow of energy.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for positive entry of energy and light
Large east-facing window to maximize morning sunlight in the living area
Window in the library offering soft light for reading and concentration
